text:
When you respond could you let her know yes will start application in Ravenna, but tell her if she needs immediate details for Adrian we had the
application completed for 6th grade in the fall of 2022 and perhaps they could review that to get a head start. This might remind her directly we did
this for 6th grade already.
Get Outlook for iOS
From: Lori Metcalf <lmetcalf@seattleacademy.org>
Sent: Friday, February 2, 2024 9:32:40 AM
To: Rob Moyer <rob.moyer@gmail.com>; Christine Moyer <christinemoyer@hotmail.com>
Subject: Re: Potential SAAS Opportunities: Adrain Moyer
Rob Moyer <rob.moyer@gmail.com>
9:40AM (2 minutes ago)
to Christine
First- how do you and I coordinate our thoughts and plans consistent with the true spirit of the RO? You lead, I’ll follow.
Second- let’s jam out the request today. I want to be responsive and timely. Then let’s agree on a time and send a response that captures both in a
single email and also asks if we can do this in person.
WRT the impending divorce, it’s not our friend in this discussion so I’d prefer that we appear to be a happy, well adjusted family. That way it does
not look like ADs issue is really home life, and not ICS.
If that is controversial to you, let’s move to OFW to discuss.
Message 948 of 4024
She only offered zoom so let’s stick to that.
I sent my times so you pick.
I’m comfortable with you responding if you could add some language to reference the application already completed for the school year.
I don’t think a teams call is needs for us to align.
Sent:02/02/2024 at 09:53 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 02/02/2024 at 09:54 AM)
Subject:Re: Moving AD to SAAS
Message 949 of 4024
The teams call was because we don't agree on some of the approach and we could discuss.
If you are going to just insist on your way, then I guess we can do that too.
Sent:02/02/2024 at 09:56 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/02/2024 at 09:58 AM)
Subject:Re: Moving AD to SAAS
